verbose_text: P2X7R may also modulate the release of several cytokines known to promote atherosclerosis, including interleukin (IL)-1beta, IL-6 and tumor necrosis factor alpha through immune cells.
evidence: P2X7R may also modulate the release of several cytokines known to promote atherosclerosis, including interleukin (IL)-1beta, IL-6 and tumor necrosis factor alpha
